name: IOUSBHostPipe
desc: An object you use to transfer data to or from a USB endpoint.

items.name: - IO
items.desc: Performs a synchronous request on a bulk or interrupt endpoint.

items.name: - AsyncIO
items.desc: Enqueues an asynchronous request on a bulk or interrupt endpoint.

items.name: - CompleteAsyncIO
items.desc: Handles the completion of an asynchronous I/O request.

items.name: - IsochIO
items.desc: Performs a synchronous or asynchronous request on an isochronous endpoint.

items.name: - CompleteAsyncIsochIO
items.desc: Handles the completion of an asynchronous request.

items.name: - CreateMemoryDescriptorRing
items.desc: Creates a memory descriptor ring for use with bundled I/O calls.

items.name: - SetMemoryDescriptor
items.desc: Adds a memory descriptor to the ring.

items.name: - AsyncIOBundled
items.desc: Enqueues a contiguous group of requests from the descriptor ring.

items.name: - CompleteAsyncIOBundled
items.desc: Handles the completion of an asynchronous bundled transfer.

items.name: - Abort
items.desc: Aborts all of the pipe's pending I/O requests.

items.name: - AdjustPipe
items.desc: Adjusts the behavior of periodic endpoints to consume a different amount of bus bandwidth.

items.name: - ClearStall
items.desc: Clears the halt condition of the pipe.

items.name: - GetDescriptors
items.desc: Retrieves the endpoint descriptors associated with this pipe.

items.name: - GetIdlePolicy
items.desc: Retrieves the pipe’s current idle timeout.

items.name: - SetIdlePolicy
items.desc: Sets the pipe’s desired idle timeout.

items.name: - GetDeviceAddress
items.desc: Retrieves the address of the device.
